meanings.sent1: The doctor will splenectomize the patient to improve their health.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon will splenectomize the diseased spleen to prevent further complications.
meanings.sent3: After the operation to splenectomize, the patient joked about feeling lighter without their spleen.
meanings.sent4: The decision to splenectomize the old building from the cityscape was met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of the surgeon's hands moving swiftly to splenectomize the spleen stayed with the patient.
